pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modeling Over Dispersed Binomial Outcome Data Using BMD and ABD // Contains probability mass functions, cumulative mass functions, negative log likelihood value, parameter estimation and modeling data using Binomial Mixture distributions (BMD) (Manoj et al (2013) doi:10.5539/ijsp.v2n2p24) and Alternate Binomial distributions (ABD).
